data.name: AFTERGLOW
data.detailed_description:
After the destabilization of the Earth's climate, problems began with providing food for humanity. The situation began to deteriorate sharply, which led first to local conflicts and then to global ones. The global war lasted 9 years, after which the world's population decreased by 86%. But 7 years after these events, new groups were able to form with an attempt on statehood. Such formations continued to use penal brigades for the most dangerous missions, including for deactivation of machines in old defensive areas.
2058 year
Penalized

Features of the game:
  • Linking the gameplay to electricity.
  • System of global goals.
  • Large open seamless world, more than 47 square kilometers.
  • Artificial intelligence in a suit and dialogues with it.
  • Energy printer.
  • Experimental weapons.
  • Systems for generating energy from space.
  • Weapon talent tree.

The game is in development and will be released only fully finished in version 1.0.
Add the game to your wishlist and follow the link in Discord.

data.short_description: AFTERGLOW - is an adventure game that takes place in the post-war period after the destabilization of the climate in 2058, where energy, weapons and modifications are valued above all else.
data.supported_languages:
English, Russian, Ukrainian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
